snippet: What is it going to take for a new generation of leaders to come up with a plan to bring this sprawling stretch of suburbia out of the 19th century?
abstract: Lawrence Downes Editorial Observer column underlines Long Island's need for updated Long Island Railroad transit system; laments that residents of Long Island dislike idea of new rail project due to not-in-my-backyard mentality.
lead_paragraph: What is it going to take for a new generation of leaders to come up with a plan to bring this sprawling stretch of suburbia out of the 19th century?

headline.print_headline: Long Island’s Future, Stuck in Transit
headline.seo: Long Island’s Future, Stuck in Transit
headline.main: Long Island’s Future, Stuck in Transit
